answers.answer: Hi, it is hard to say, but it could be vitamin deficiencies, depression itself, low potassium levels, neuropathy, diabetes etc.Please get blood tests done to rule out these conditions. Try vitamin supplements for month or so. Unlikely to be  food allergy. Exercise along with intake of green vegetables might help.

question: For the past few years I have experieced disabling effects lasting a few weeks. These effects are weekening in legs, constipation, fategue, and depression. These two week effects occer about six times a year. Could these symtons be from food alergies or enviremental?This discussion is related tohttp://www.medhelp.org/posts/show/293370.
title: nerves & alergies
